sentence: On the other side of the political aisle, Democrats appear to be coalescing around Rep. Tim Ryan as he looks to jump to the upper chamber.
author: The Hill via Nexstar Media Wire
title: These Senate seats are up for election in 2022

sentence: There has not been much polling in Ohio but a poll last fall showed Rep. Tim Ryan, the likely Democratic nominee, in a tight race with any of the likely Republican nominees in a state that Trump easily carried twice.
author: Igor Derysh
title: Republicans in chaos: Conflict with Trump endangers GOP Senate prospects

sentence: Ohio Democratic Rep. Tim Ryan, the favorite for the Senate nomination, raised $4.1 million and has $6.5 million on hand.

title: Senate Democrats raise money furiously to defend majority

sentence: Ohio Rep. Tim Ryan, the leading Democrat in an open-seat Senate race, has co-sponsored a bill that would prevent the Biden administration from what he calls a "wrong and reckless" decision to lift the Title 42 restrictions.
author: Eric Bradner
title: Swing-state Democrats turn on Biden over Title 42 border decision
